# Contributor License Agreement

By making a contribution to this project, I agree to the following terms:

## 1. Grant of Rights

I grant to the project maintainer (Iulian Bacalu) and recipients of software distributed by the maintainer a perpetual, worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, irrevocable license to:

- Use, copy, modify, and distribute my contributions
- Sublicense my contributions under any license, including proprietary licenses
- Use my contributions in commercial products

## 2. Representations

I represent that:

- I am the original author of the contribution, or I have the right to submit it
- My contribution does not violate any third-party rights
- I have the legal authority to enter into this agreement

## 3. No Obligation

I understand that:

- The maintainer is not obligated to use or include my contribution
- This agreement does not create an employment or partnership relationship

## 4. Workflow Files Exception

This CLA applies to contributions to the **engine source code**. YAML workflow files contributed to the templates directory are governed by this same CLA to ensure the project can be dual-licensed.

---

By submitting a pull request or patch, you confirm that you agree to this Contributor License Agreement.
